title: 1 Acre for Immediate Sale
details:
Kalutara Koholana. 1 Acre for immediate sale.

6.5 KM from Kalutara Town to the land.

On plathota, Kethhena road. 800m from Koholana Junction towards Serupita.

Access from two roads. ( 20 feet main road and 10 feet by road access )

Ideal for a Housing Project, Factory or Cultivation.

Government Valuation Rs. 3,800,000/-

Rs. 4,000,000 / - ( Negotiable )

Contact : 0750785316
